item.title: Hack The Box - Postman
item.description: Welcome to another Forest Hex hacking adventure! üå≤üèπ Today I will be hacking a box named Postman. Postman HTB Card Feel free to jump around as always: Port Scan Investigating Open Ports Finding a Foothold Escalating to a user shell Getting Root Port Scan Let’s dive right in with a port scan: nmap -p- -sC -sV --min-rate=1000 -T4 10.10.10.160 Looks like I have a few avenues of attack here.
